description: Submits a quota increase request for the specified quota at the account or resource level.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The API allows for requesting additional resources, enabling the attacker to develop infrastructure needed for further malicious activities.
Attackers using valid accounts might request increased quotas to misuse cloud resources under the guise of legitimate activity.
Increasing resource quotas to their maximum can be used to create conditions that lead to resource exhaustion and potential denial-of-service attacks.
By increasing quotas, attackers can potentially disable or impair security monitoring tools, operating outside of normal detection thresholds.
The API can help attackers identify previously requested quota increases, revealing insights into cloud resource usage and potential targets within an account.

incidents.description: Incident report: From CLI to console, chasing an attacker in AWS

securityImplications: Attackers might use RequestServiceQuotaIncrease to increase the quotas and so resource hijacking will have a bigger impact.
